description:
LEARN AFTER EFFECTS AND MASTER 3D LAYERS IN AFTER EFFECTS

  • Full & free lifetime access to the complete course
  • All future & additional lectures shall always be free
  • As a student you can request for additional lectures where necessary
  • No other software is needed "You only need after effects".
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee
  • No Prior after effces knowledge needed "Guaranteed"

LEARN HOW TO USE AFTER EFFECTS 3D SPACE AND 3D LAYERS MORE EFFECTIVELY

HOW TO UNDER STAND AFTEREFFECTS XYZ AXIS

CONVERTING 2D LAYERS IN TO 3D LAYERS AND USE THEM TO CREATE A CUBE AND ANIMATE IT

HOW TO ADD SHADOWS AND LIGHTS IN 3D SPACE

HOW TO PARENT LAYERS AND USE A NULL OBJECT

------------"if you want to master after effects then this is your course" --------------

What to expect from this course?

the first session of this course will cover the basics of after effects.

i also take the time to cover most of the tools we are to use through the course in detail so that we are all at the same page.

later in the course you will learn how aftereffects 3d workspace works and how to navigate it effectively and easiliy.

then you will learn how to create 3d layers and create a cube from them which we later animate,

you will learn how to add lights in your seen and shadows

you will also learn how to add and animate a 3d camera

you will also learn how to use the null object and parenting in aftereffects

''All future extra lectures'' and upgrades are always included for free. Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!
title: Learn  After Effects and master 3d layers in after effects
